Class FilterApplicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gmit.FilterApplicator
  • public class FilterApplicator
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    2019-12 (4.14.0) This class is used to apply a given filter kernel to a given image.
    Author:
    Ryan Clinton

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private int applyFilter​(int pixel, int x, int y)
      Apply the kernel convolution matrix to a given pixel and position Does so in full colour - splits the pixel into r,g,b, filters them individually, them combines them.

      • applyFilter

        private int applyFilter​(int pixel,
                        int x,
                        int y)
        Apply the kernel convolution matrix to a given pixel and position Does so in full colour - splits the pixel into r,g,b, filters them individually, them combines them.
        Parameters:
        pixel - - The RBG value of the pixel to be filtered
        x - - X Coordinate
        y - - Y Coordinate
        Returns:
        filtered RGB value for pixel
